Detection of known packer signatures or.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 (Process Creation). Integrate static analysis tools to scan executable files associated with newly created processes for known packer signatures, high entropy levels, or characteristic packing artifacts. Flag processes exhibiting properties consistent with known software packing.

Suspicious process creation or file modi.Action: Analyze Windows Event ID 4688 (Process Creation) for processes with unusual parent-child relationships, unexpected execution paths (e.g., from temporary directories), or strange command-line arguments that may indicate unpacking or execution from memory. Use correlation analysis to link suspicious process creation events with preceding file write/modification events or network activity observed in Zeek logs.
